languages.text: "Когда Ирлиэт откроет свою душу нашим путям, то вновь обретет дом — уже среди нас. Иначе... хм, иначе ей придется расстаться с побрякушкой, что она носит на себе, словно жалкий щит от Той, Что Жаждет. Но ничего, когда мы закончим... когда мы закончим, камень душ тебе не понадобится, сестренка".

traits.locale_text: "Когда Ирлиэт откроет свою душу нашим путям, то вновь обретет дом — уже среди нас. Иначе... хм, иначе ей придется расстаться с побрякушкой, что она носит на себе, словно жалкий щит от Той, Что Жаждет. Но ничего, когда мы закончим... когда мы закончим, камень душ тебе не понадобится, сестренка".
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: "Once Yrliet opens her soul to our ways, she will have a home once more — among our kind. If she refuses, well... then she will have to give up that bauble she wears as a flimsy shield against She Who Thirsts. But there is no cause for alarm... When we are done here, our little sister will need her spirit stone no longer."
languages.original_text: "Когда Ирлиэт откроет свою душу нашим путям, то вновь обретет дом — уже среди нас. Иначе... хм, иначе ей придется расстаться с побрякушкой, что она носит на себе, словно жалкий щит от Той, Что Жаждет. Но ничего, когда мы закончим... когда мы закончим, камень душ тебе не понадобится, сестренка".

If she refuses, well... then she will have to give up that bauble she wears as a flimsy shield against She Who Thirsts. But there is no cause for alarm... When we are done here, our little sister will need her spirit stone no longer."
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: 「ユリエットが俺たちのやり方に心を開けば、もう一度故郷と呼べる場所を取り戻すことができるだろう…俺たちの同胞として、な。拒めば…かの渇きたる女に対抗する薄っぺらな盾として身に着けている宝飾品を手放さなければならなくなる。だが心配することはない…ここでの用が済めば、俺たちの妹が魂縛石を必要とすることは、もうなくなるのだから」
languages.original_text: "Once Yrliet opens her soul to our ways, she will have a home once more — among our kind. If she refuses, well... then she will have to give up that bauble she wears as a flimsy shield against She Who Thirsts. But there is no cause for alarm... When we are done here, our little sister will need her spirit stone no longer."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエットが俺たちのやり方に心を開けば、もう一度故郷と呼べる場所を取り戻すことができるだろう…俺たちの同胞として、な。拒めば…かの渇きたる女に対抗する薄っぺらな盾として身に着けている宝飾品を手放さなければならなくなる。だが心配することはない…ここでの用が済めば、俺たちの妹が魂縛石を必要とすることは、もうなくなるのだから」
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: “只要伊莉耶特向我们敞开了她的灵魂，她就会在我们之中找到新家。但如果她拒绝，嗯……她恐怕不得不放弃她戴着的那件小玩意儿。她靠着这件脆弱的护符抵挡饥渴女士的视线，但即便如此，也不用惊慌……等我们办完了这里的事情之后，我们的小妹妹就再也不需要她的灵魂石了。”
languages.original_text: "Once Yrliet opens her soul to our ways, she will have a home once more — among our kind. If she refuses, well... then she will have to give up that bauble she wears as a flimsy shield against She Who Thirsts. But there is no cause for alarm... When we are done here, our little sister will need her spirit stone no longer."

traits.locale_text: “只要伊莉耶特向我们敞开了她的灵魂，她就会在我们之中找到新家。但如果她拒绝，嗯……她恐怕不得不放弃她戴着的那件小玩意儿。她靠着这件脆弱的护符抵挡饥渴女士的视线，但即便如此，也不用惊慌……只要我们办完了这里的事情，我们的小妹妹就再也不需要她的灵魂石了。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: «Cuando Yrliet abra su alma a nuestras costumbres, volverá a tener un hogar, ahora entre los nuestros. Si se niega, bueno... tendrá que entregarnos esa baratija que lleva como pobre escudo contra la Sedienta. Pero no hay nada que temer: cuando terminemos con esto, nuestra hermanita ya no necesitará su joya espiritual».
languages.original_text: "Once Yrliet opens her soul to our ways, she will have a home once more — among our kind. If she refuses, well... then she will have to give up that bauble she wears as a flimsy shield against She Who Thirsts. But there is no cause for alarm... When we are done here, our little sister will need her spirit stone no longer."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando Yrliet abra su alma a nuestras costumbres, volverá a tener un hogar, ahora entre los nuestros. Si se niega, bueno... tendrá que entregarnos esa baratija que lleva como pobre escudo contra la Sedienta. Pero no hay nada que temer: cuando terminemos con esto, nuestra hermanita ya no necesitará su joya espiritual».
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: "Sobald Yrliet ihre Seele für unsere Wege öffnet, hat sie wieder ein Zuhause ... unter unseresgleichen. Wenn sie sich weigert, nun ... dann wird sie den Tand aufgeben müssen, den sie als dünnen Schild gegen Sie, die dürstet, trägt. Aber es besteht kein Grund zur Sorge ... Wenn wir hier fertig sind, wird unsere kleine Schwester ihren Seelenstein nicht mehr brauchen."
languages.original_text: "Once Yrliet opens her soul to our ways, she will have a home once more — among our kind. If she refuses, well... then she will have to give up that bauble she wears as a flimsy shield against She Who Thirsts. But there is no cause for alarm... When we are done here, our little sister will need her spirit stone no longer."

traits.locale_text: "Sobald Yrliet ihre Seele für unsere Wege öffnet, hat sie wieder ein Zu hause — unter unseresgleichen. Wenn sie sich weigert, nun ... Dann wird sie den Tand aufgeben müssen, den sie als dünnen Schild gegen Sie, die dürstet, trägt. Doch es besteht kein Grund zur Sorge ... Wenn wir hier fertig sind, wird unsere kleine Schwester ihren Seelenstein nicht länger brauchen."
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: « Une fois qu'Yrliet aura ouvert son cœur à nos méthodes, elle retrouvera un foyer... parmi les nôtres. Si elle refuse, eh bien... elle devra abandonner cette babiole qui lui sert de bouclier contre l'Assoiffée. Mais inutile de s'alarmer... Quand nous en aurons fini ici, notre petite sœur n'aura plus besoin de sa pierre-esprit. »
languages.original_text: "Once Yrliet opens her soul to our ways, she will have a home once more — among our kind. If she refuses, well... then she will have to give up that bauble she wears as a flimsy shield against She Who Thirsts. But there is no cause for alarm... When we are done here, our little sister will need her spirit stone no longer."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois qu'Yrliet aura ouvert son cœur à nos méthodes, elle retrouvera un foyer... parmi les nôtres. Si elle refuse, eh bien... elle devra abandonner cette babiole qui lui sert de bouclier contre l'Assoiffée. Mais inutile de s'alarmer... Quand nous en aurons fini ici, notre petite sœur n'aura plus besoin de sa pierre-esprit. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: "Yrliet, yöntemlerimizi bağrına basar basmaz aramıza katılacak ve yurt bileceği bir yere kavuşacak. Razı gelmezse de... İşte o zaman Susayan'a karşı kalkan olsun diye taktığı incik boncuklardan vazgeçmesi gerekecek. Gelgelelim endişeye mahal yok... Burada işimiz bitince minik kardeşimizin ruh taşına ihtiyacı kalmayacak."
languages.original_text: "Once Yrliet opens her soul to our ways, she will have a home once more — among our kind. If she refuses, well... then she will have to give up that bauble she wears as a flimsy shield against She Who Thirsts. But there is no cause for alarm... When we are done here, our little sister will need her spirit stone no longer."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet yöntemlerimizi bağrına basar basmaz aramıza katılıp yeniden kendine yurt bileceği bir yere kavuşmuş olacak. Razı gelmezse de... İşte o zaman Susayan'a karşı eften püften bir kalkan olsun diye taktığı incik boncuğundan vazgeçmesi gerekecek. Yine de endişelenmeye gerek yok... Burada işimiz bitince minik kardeşimizin artık ruh taşına ihtiyacı olmayacak."
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit
